assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: b) Under what circumstances would you consider stopping the therapy â€“( this could include lack of expected response of the identified signs and symptoms to treatment, adverse effects of the treatment which would mandate drug discontinuation, noncompliance with recommended treatment and/or assessments and any other circumstances under which you would recommend that the treatment be discontinued)
